name: NexStarCtl
short_description:
This module implements the serial commands supported by the Celestron NexStar hand control. This applies to the NexStar GPS, NexStar GPS-SA, NexStar iSeries, NexStar SE Series, NexStar GT, CPC, SLT, Advanced-VX, Advanced-GT, and CGE mounts.

Communication to the hand control is 9600 bits/sec, no parity and one stop bit via the RS-232 port on the base of the hand control.

For extended example how to use this perl module look in to the distribution folder for nexstarctl.pl. This program is a complete console tool to control NexStar telesctopes based on NexStarCtl module.

To control network based telescopes nexbridge must be used on the remote site.
https://sourceforge.net/projects/nexbridge/
summary: Cross platform Perl API to control NexStar compatible telescopes
